CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 18, 1964, pg. 7 reads: "With "Mr. B." - After their "Presentation Ball" at the Holiday House, Sunday nights, the Dynamic Danettes posed for this picture with handsome Billy (Mr. B) Eckstine, who was the star of their show. Left to right: Martha Loper, Gladys Brown, Florence Hutchinson, Ida Jones, president; "Mr. B.," Margaret Nelson, Betty Culberson, Gladys Lawson, Jessie Grogan and Dee C. Woodfork. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of the Dynamic Danettes Civic Club, left to right: Martha Loper, Gladys Brown, Florence Hutchinson, Ida Jones, Margaret Nelson, Betty Culberson, Gladys Lawson, Jessie Grogan and Dee C. Woodfork, with Billy Eckstine in center, standing in the Holiday House for the Presentation Ball
